Get a survey

Get a survey

surveys_get(id)

Arguments

id

integer required. Survey ID

Value

A list containing the following elements:

id

integer, Survey ID

scriptVersion

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • id integer,

  • script object,

  • questions array,

vendor

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • id integer,

  • name string,

sample

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • id integer,

  • sampleTable object,

  • vendorSampleTable object,

  • strataTabsTable object,

  • uniqueId string,

  • householdColumn integer,

  • basefile object,

  • desiredCompletes integer,

  • oversamplePercent integer,

  • buckets array,

  • contactMethods array,

  • targetAudience string,

  • populationLimitingSQL string,

  • frameLimitingSQL string,

  • parentId integer,

  • metadata object,

sampleSchemaTable

string,

returns

array, An array containing the following fields:

  • id integer,

  • dials integer,

  • completes integer,

  • matches integer,

  • refusals integer,

  • matchedCompletes integer,

  • earlyTermination integer,

  • other integer,

  • status string,

rollupJobId

integer,

metadata

object, Metadata

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
